t: Buy the Norelco Norelco All-in-One Trimmer Series 9000 MG9510/60 Series 9000
s: The trimmer and its multi-guard set offer 19 length settings from 0.5 to 16 mm in up to 0.2 mm precision steps for shorter and longer beard styles. The narrow design of the precision trimmer attachment makes it easy to create sharp edges and fine details.
